title: 86x6: Gifts From a Government Employee’s Subordinate
summary:
An employee could purchase discount airline tickets from the wife of the government employee’s subordinate without violating the gift restrictions of 5 U.S.C. § 7351 and 5 C.F.R. § 735.202(d); however, the employee’s agency could determine that such an action still created the appearance of impropriety.   

Notes: [cites former 5 C.F.R. part 735]
